contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=March 2012}} {{Infobox political party| country = Catalonia| party_name = Esquerra Unida i Alternativa| colorcode = red | party_logo = [[File:United and Alternative Left logo.jpg]] | leader = [[Jordi Miralles]] (General Secretary)| foundation = 1998 | ideology = <br />[[Communism]],<br />[[Democratic socialism]],<br />[[Marxism]],<br />[[Ecologism]] | headquarters = C/Doctor Aiguader,10 <br /> 08003 [[Barcelona]] | colours = [[Red]] | members = | europarl = [[GUE/NGL]]| national = [[United Left (Spain)|United Left]] | international = ''None'' | european = [[Party of the European Left]] | |seats1_title = [[Congress of Deputies (Spain)|Congress of Deputies]] |seats1 = {{Infobox political party/seats|1|350|hex=#FF2400}} |seats2_title = [[Parliament of Catalonia]] |seats2 = {{Infobox political party/seats|3|135|hex=#FF2400}} |website = [http://www.euia.cat/ http://www.euia.cat/] }} [[Image:Sopareuia.jpg|left|thumb|200px|Annual EUiA dinner party, 2007]] '''United and Alternative Left''' ({{lang-ca|Esquerra Unida i Alternativa'', '''EUiA'}}) is a [[political party]] from [[Catalonia]], [[Spain]]. EUiA has 4000 members and it is the Catalan correspondent of the Spain-wide United Left (''[[Izquierda Unida (Spain)|Izquierda Unida]]''). It was formed in 1998 as a schism from ''[[Iniciativa per Catalunya]]'' (IpC). It comprises an alliance of [[Party of the Catalonian Communists]], [[PSUC viu]], POR, PRT-IR, PASOC, CEA and CLI. After competing in a series of elections with their former colleagues at ''Iniciativa'', the two parties agreed to run together as an [[electoral coalition]]. Currently, 2 out of the 12 MPs at the regional [[Parliament of Catalonia]] adscribed to the IpC-EUiA group are members of this latter party. ==See also== *[[List of political parties in Catalonia]] ==External links== *[http://www.euia.cat/ Esquerra Unida i Alternativa web site (in Catalan)] {{Catalan political parties}} {{Spanish political parties}} {{Party of the European Left}} [[Category:United Left (Spain)]] [[Category:Communist parties from Spain]] [[Category:Political parties in Catalonia]] [[Category:Political parties established in 1998]] {{Euro-socialist-party-stub}}
